page.title: 20RECREATION-RAWYARDS CENTRE
page.content: MONKLANDS LEISURE CENTRE, AIRDRIE ALSO ORGANISES CONDITIONING COURSES FOR THOSE WHO WISH TO LEARN THE PRINCIPLES OF WEIGHT TRAINING AND THERE ARE SPECIAL SESSIONS FOR SENIOR CITIZENS WITH THE EMPHASIS ON GENTLE EXERCISES TO KEEP THE HEART AND LUNGS WORKING CORRECTLY AND THE JOINTS MOBILE AND SUPPLE. {ST.MARGARET'S HIGH SCHOOL}IN THE ADJOINING SQUARE TO THE WEST (ITS THIRD YEAR FOUNDATION GEOGRAPHY PUPILS AUTHORS OF THIS TEXT) POSSESSES NO PLAYING FIELD FACILITIES AT ALL BUT IS RATHER FORTUNATE IN HAVING FULL ACCESS TO SUCH A RANGE OF SPORTING AND RECREATIONAL FACILITIES ON ITS DOORSTEP.
